entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 50
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 40
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, DIMINISHING TO AROUND 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS AROUND 40
